description: My place is close to Barney Greengrass, The Mermaid Inn, Edgar's Cafe, Carmine's, Big Daddy's, Tal Bagels, Central Park, Riverside Park, Whole Foods, 1,2,3,B,C subway lines. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the coziness, the high ceilings, the light and the convenient location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Lovely, clean one-bedroom on the Upper West Side
review: This is a cozy & warm 4 floor walk up apartment in UWS. We haven't meet Lisa personally but she responded the emails very fast and the instructions to pick up the keys were clear & easy.
